data.actual_result: It will show the Quick React button
data.expected_result: The Quick React button should not show in the first place, if you don't have permission to react.
data.short_description: Quick Reaction Button without react Permission
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a message in a channel you can't react to, which has reactions - Hit the quick react button (which shouldn't show) - After the selecting an Emoji from the Emoji List it will tell you you're missing permissions
